info.description:
## Autentificarea

SmartBill REST API foloseste o procedura de autentificare preemptiva, pe baza unui model de autentificare acces de baza (**Basic Authentication**), folosind credentialele: utilizator si token:

*   **Utilizatorul** este adresa de e-mail cu care se face autentificarea in contul SmartBill Facturare/Gestiune;
*   **Tokenul** se gaseste in contul de SmartBill Facturare/Gestiune> sectiunea Contul Meu > Integrari, in partea de jos a paginii, in zona dedicata API.
    

* * *

## Authentication

  
SmartBill REST API uses a preemptive authentication procedure, based on a basic access authentication model (**Basic Authentication**), using the credentials: user and token:

*   **The username** is the e-mail address used to log in to SmartBill Facturare/Gestiune;
*   **The token** can be found in Contul Meu > Integrari, in the dedicated API area.

item.name: Emitere factura pe baza de proforma

request.description:
Acesta este un exemplu de emitere de factura cand facturarea se face pe baza unei proforme.

Factura proforma pe baza careia se face emiterea trebuie sa fie deja emisa. Emiterea ei se poate face fie din contul SmartBill Cloud, fie prin API public, apeland metoda de emitere de proforma.

Parametrii care fac referire la factura proforma pe baza careia se face emiterea sunt:

``` json
"useEstimateDetails": true,
    "estimate": {
      "seriesName": "ppub1",
      "number": "0021"
    }

```

Pentru ca o factura sa fie generata cu succes este necesar ca:

*   parametrul **useEstimateDetails** sa fie **true** pentru a se prelua pe factura informatiile din proforma
*   **specificarea seriei si a numarului facturii proforme** pe baza careia este emisa factura.  
    In cazul in care parametrul **useStock** este **true**, se va face descarcarea din stoc a produselor facturate.

Exista doua modalitati prin care poti adauga un link de plata pe document.

O prima modalitate presupune generarea link-ului de plata la momentul emiterii facturii si va functiona doar in situatia in care ai configurat contul tau Netopia Payments sau cel de EuPlatesc in [Contul Meu > Integrari](https://cloud.smartbill.ro/core/integrari//).

In acest caz, la trimiterea parametrului de mai jos se va genera link-ul de plata in Netopia, respectiv EuPlatesc, si link-ul va fi asociat butonului "PLATESTE CU CARDUL" de pe factura:

``` json
  {
  "paymentUrl": "Generate URL",
  }

```

Raspuns:

``` json
 {
   "errorText": "",
   "message": "",
   "number": "0177",
   "series": "fac",
   "url": "https://secure.mobilpay.ro/qp/BiSujm14-w3g2c-DzlVa0"
 }

```

A doua modalitate prin care poti adauga link-ul de plata pe documente se aplica in situatia in care utilizezi un operator de plati diferit de cei integrati in SmartBill, spre exemplu Stripe. Astfel, va fi necesara generarea link-ului de plata in Stripe si apoi trimiterea acestuia pe parametrul paymentURL cu valoarea linkului respectiv.

``` json
  {
  "paymentUrl": "link_plata_din_stripe",
  }

```

request.description:
La emiterea facturii este posibila aplicarea unui discount care poate fi valoric sau procentual. Discountul se va aplica pe un numar de produse introduse deja pe factura. Numarul de produse va fi stabilit prin parametrul **numberOfItems**, care face referire la produsele si discounturile imediat anterioare discountului.

La **discountul valoric** se stabileste direct valoarea discountului. In acest caz parametrul discountType ia valoarea 1, iar valoarea discountului se transmite ca valoare negativa prin parametrul discountValue.

``` json
{
    "isDiscount": true,
    "numberOfItems": 2,
    "discountType": 1,
    "discountValue": -5
}

```

In cazul aplicarii unui discount pe un produs se urmaresc pasii urmatori:

*   Se adauga produsul/produsele pe document, parametrul isDiscount este false. Detalii in tabelul [Date produs](https://api.smartbill.ro/#DateProdus).
*   **Atentie!** Parametrul numberOfItems stabileste numarul de produse pe care se aplica discountul si reprezinta numarul de produse (produs sau discount) care sunt imediat anterioare sectiunii curente.
*   In cazul in care se doreste aplicarea a doua discounturi (spre ex, unul procentual si unul valoric) pe acelasi produs/produse, discounturile se adauga succesiv. Al doilea discount se va aplica atat pentru produs cat si pentru primul discount care a fost deja considerat.
    

**Observatii in cazul aplicarii unui discount pe mai multe produse!**

1) In cazul aplicarii unui discount pe mai multe produse, cota TVA folosita pentru discount, va fi cota TVA folosita pentru produsele pe care acest discount se aplica. Valorile parametrilor taxName si/sau taxPercentage sunt ignorate.

2) Discountul procentual poate fi aplicat pe mai multe produse doar daca acestea au aceeasi cota TVA. In cazul in care se aplica pe produse cu cote TVA diferite, va fi returnat un mesaj de eroare.

3) Discountul valoric poate fi aplicat pe mai multe produse cu cote TVA diferite. In acest caz este obligatorie specificarea cotei TVA folosite la discount prin parametrii taxPercentage (obligatoriu) si taxName (optional).

request.description:
Incasarea unei facturi se poate face partial sau integral la facturare, sau ulterior prin [emiterea unei incasari](https://api.smartbill.ro/#Incasari/addPaymentPublicApi).

Parametrul type defineste tipul de incasare care poate fi Chitanta, Bon, Card, CEC, Bilet ordin, Ordin plata, Mandat postal sau Alta incasare.

In cazul in care incasarea se face cu chitanta, o chitanta va fi automat emisa si salvata in sistem. Pentru aceasta, seria chitantei trebuie specificata (serie definita in prealabil in contul Cloud, [vezi serii documente](https://api.smartbill.ro/#SeriiDocumenteCloud)).

In cazul in care sunteti conectati la o casa de marcat, incasarea se poate face prin emiterea unui bon fiscal. Pentru aceasta, se alege tipul de incasare *type = Bon* iar apoi se apeleaza metoda de [emitere bon](https://api.smartbill.ro/#Incasari/addPaymentPublicApi/Emitere_de_bon_fiscal).

Incasarea facturii la emitere se face prin introducerea sectiunii **payment** care contine parametrii referitori la incasare. Pentru detalii vezi [tabelul de parametrii pentru incasare](https://api.smartbill.ro/#DateIncasare).

    "value": 10,

Optiunea de emitere a facturii cu TVA la incasare se va utiliza doar in cazul in care firma este configurata ca platitoare de TVA si cand s-a ales incasarea totala sau partiala la facturare.

Pentru corectitudinea datelor inregistrate pe factura, este necesara corelarea valorilor referitoare la incasarea din sectiunea TVA la incasare cu cele din sectiunea **payment**. Aplicatia nu face verificari in aceasta privinta.

Acestia sunt parametrii necesari pentru definirea folosirii TVA la incasare sunt:

| Parametru | Value |
| --- | --- |
| paymentBase | valoare baza incasata pe baza careia se calculeaza TVA |
| colectedTax | valoare TVA incasat |
| paymentTotal | total valoare incasata = valoare baza incasata + valoare TVA incasat |

``` json
{
    "usePaymentTax": true,
    "paymentBase": 20,
    "colectedTax": 0.19,
    "paymentTotal": 20,
}

```

Cand **usePaymentTax** are valoarea **false** sau lipseste din request, indiferent daca restul parametrilor apar sau nu, pe factura nu va fi afisat nimic in legatura cu TVA la incasare.

Cand **usePaymentTax** are valoarea **true** si:

*   *paymentBase, colectedTax si paymentTotal vor primi valori corespunzatoare cu incasarea care a fost facuta la facturare*:

request.description:
When issuing the invoice it is possible to apply a discount value or a discount percentage. The discount will be applied to a number of products already included on the invoice. The number of products will be determined by the **numberOfItems** parameter, which refers to the products and discounts immediately prior to the discount.

In regards to the **discount value**, the value of the discount is established directly. In this case, the **discountType** parameter takes the value **1**, and **the discount value is transmitted as a negative value through the discountValue parameter**.

``` json
{
    "isDiscount": true,
    "numberOfItems": 2,
    "discountType": 1,
    "discountValue": -5
}

```

In case of applying a discount on a product, follow the following steps:

*   The product(s) are added to the document with the **isDiscount** parameter set to **false**;
*   Immediately after adding the product(s) to which the discount is applied, a new **product** section will be used where the **isDiscount** parameter is set to **true** which contains the discount data.
    

> Careful! The **numberOfItems** parameter sets the number of products to which the discount applies and represents the number of products (product or discount) that are immediately preceding the current section.

If you want to apply two discounts (for example, a discount percentage and a discount value) for the same product(s), the discounts are added successively. The second discount will apply to both the product and the first discount that has already been considered.

**Remarks in case of applying a discount on several products!**

1) If applying a discount to several products, the VAT rate used for the discount will be the VAT rate used for the products to which this discount applies. The **taxName** and / or **taxPercentage** parameters values will be ignored.

2) The discount percentage can be applied to several products only if they have the same VAT rate. If it applies to products with different VAT rates, an error message will be returned.

3) The discount value can be applied on several products with different VAT rates. In this case, it is mandatory to specify the VAT rate used at the discount through the **taxPercentage** (mandatory) and **taxName** (optional) parameters.

If you want to apply two discounts (for example, a discount percentage and a discount value) for the same product(s), the discounts are added successively. The second discount will apply to both the product and the first discount that has already been considered.

**Remarks in case of applying a discount on several products!**

1) If applying a discount to several products, the VAT rate used for the discount will be the VAT rate used for the products to which this discount applies. The **taxName** and / or **taxPercentage** parameters values will be ignored.

2) The discount percentage can be applied to several products only if they have the same VAT rate. If it applies to products with different VAT rates, an error message will be returned.

When issuing an invoice, you can choose to decrease the inventory stock of the invoiced products.

Decreasing the inventory stock will be done when issuing the invoice and the stock will be increased if the invoice is deleted or canceled.

To decrease the inventory stock at the time of invoicing, the following are required:

*   you need to have the Gestiune module activated;
*   there has to be at least one warehouse created in [Nomenclatoare > Gestiuni](https://cloud.smartbill.ro/nomenclator/gestiuni/) ;;
*   the warehouse needs to have products in the inventory stock;
*   the invoiced product's measurement unit needs to be the same as the one used to load the inventory stock.
    

To activate the stock management, the **usestock** parameter with **true** value is used.

``` json
    "useStock": true,

```

If the stock is decreased when invoicing based on an estimate, the **usestock** parameter needs to be **true** within the **estimate** section.

``` json
    "estimate": {
        [...]
        "useStock": true
    }

```

In the **products** section, for each invoiced product, it is necessary to specify the name of the warehouse by using the **warehouseName** parameter.

``` json
"products": [
        {
            [...]
            "warehouseName": "Gestiune1",
        }
    ]

```

If invoicing a product that is not in stock, the **useStock** parameter will be set to **false**. In this case, in order to have the corect stock information, it is necessary to manually decrease the invoice's stock from the [*Documente fara descarcare gestiune*](https://cloud.smartbill.ro/gestiune/raport/raport_documente_nedescarcate/) report, once the product will become available in stock.

request.description:
When issuing the estimate it is possible to apply a discount value or a discount percentage. The discount will be applied to a number of products already included on the estimate. The number of products will be determined by the **numberOfItems** parameter, which refers to the products and discounts immediately prior to the discount.

In regards to the **discount value**, the value of the discount is established directly. In this case, the **discountType** parameter takes the value **1**, and **the discount value is transmitted as a negative value through the discountValue parameter**.

``` json
{
    "isDiscount": true,
    "numberOfItems": 2,
    "discountType": 1,
    "discountValue": -5
}

```

In case of applying a discount on a product, follow the following steps:

*   The product(s) are added to the document with the **isDiscount** parameter set to **false**;
*   Immediately after adding the product(s) to which the discount is applied, a new **product** section will be used where the **isDiscount** parameter is set to **true** which contains the discount data.
    

> Careful! The **numberOfItems** parameter sets the number of products to which the discount applies and represents the number of products (product or discount) that are immediately preceding the current section.

If you want to apply two discounts (for example, a discount percentage and a discount value) for the same product(s), the discounts are added successively. The second discount will apply to both the product and the first discount that has already been considered.

**Remarks in case of applying a discount on several products!**

1) If applying a discount to several products, the VAT rate used for the discount will be the VAT rate used for the products to which this discount applies. The **taxName** and / or **taxPercentage** parameters values will be ignored.

2) The discount percentage can be applied to several products only if they have the same VAT rate. If it applies to products with different VAT rates, an error message will be returned.

3) The discount value can be applied on several products with different VAT rates. In this case, it is mandatory to specify the VAT rate used at the discount through the **taxPercentage** (mandatory) and **taxName** (optional) parameters.

request.description:
Sending the attached estimate by email to the customer can be done at the time of invoicing or after the time of invoicing.

Configuring your own email server in your SmartBill account is required in order to be able to send the invoice to the client and can be done from [SmartBill Cloud > Configurare > Email](https://cloud.smartbill.ro/core/configurare_mailuri/).

Sending the attached estimate through email at the time of issuance is done by setting the parameter **sendEmail** as **true**.

You can also add the **email** section which will contain parameters regarding who will receive the invoice.

``` json
 "sendEmail": true,
 "email": {
     "to": "test@firma.ro",
     "cc": "test1@firma.ro",
     "bcc": "test2@firma.ro"
 }

```

When **the "to" parameter is missing**, the estimate will be sent to the email address defined in the **email** parameter from the **customer** section.

When **the "to" parameter is completed**, the email in this field will receive the estimate and not the one defined in the **email** parameter from the **customer** section.

The SmartBill API allows you to issue an estimate in RON when the prices are in another currency

In order to perform this operation correctly, it is necessary to configure the company by activating the "Am preturi cu moneda de referinta in valuta" option from [Preferinte generale](https://cloud.smartbill.ro/documente/preferinte-generale/). More information can be found [here](https://api.smartbill.ro/#ConfigurareFacturiValuta).

When invoicing, the products can have prices in different currencies (ex: 2 products in EUR, 1 product in RON and 1 product in USD). If the exchange rate is not specified, the exchange rate used will depend on the "Curs valutar preluat de pe internet" option from [Preferinte personale](https://cloud.smartbill.ro/core/configurare/preferinte-personale/).

* * *

The specific parameters are:

*   **In the billing data section**, the **currency** parameter that defines the currency of the estimate that will be issued
*   In the **products** section:
    *   the **currency** parameter which defines the currency in which the product price is set
    *   the **price** parameter which defines the price in the specified currency
    *   If you want to use a different exchange rate than the one taken from the internet or the one defined in the SmartBill Cloud account, one can use the **exchangeRate** parameter which defines the exchange rate used for the automatic conversion of the estimate.

The method is used to send the invoice through email, as an attachment, to the customer.

In order to send e-mails successfully, it is necessary to [configure your email server](https://ajutor.smartbill.ro/article/37-email) from the SmartBill account from which the email is send

The **bodyText** parameter will contain the text of the email, encoded using [Base64](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt) .

In the text message, SmartBill can automatically retrieve and display document information. This information can be:

*   **#tip document#**: depending on the used parameter, it displays in the email the type of the document, more precisely "invoice" or "estimate";
*   **#serie numar document#**: displays in email the document series and number;
*   **#link document#**: displays the URL to the document in the email;
*   **#data emiterii#**: displays in email the issue date of the document;
*   **#data scadentei#**: displays in email the due date of the document;
*   **#total document#**: displays in email the total value of the document, in the currency in which it was issued
*   **#mentiune#**: displays in the email the mention on the document
*   **#nume client#**: displays in the email the name of the client for whom the document was issued;
*   **#persoana contact#**: displays in the email the contact's name - if you entered this name on the issued document.

> Hello,
> 
> Attached you will find the **#tip document# #serie numar document#** issued on ***#data emiterii#***, with the total of ***#total document#***.
> 
> Thank you!

This Base64 encoded message will take the form below:

SGVsbG8sIDwvYnI+PC9icj5BdHRhY2hlZCB5b3Ugd2lsbCBmaW5kIHRoZSAgPGI+PGk+I3RpcCBkb2N1bWVudCMgI3NlcmllIG51bWFyIGRvY3VtZW50IzwvaT48L2I+ICBpc3N1ZWQgb24gPGk+I2RhdGEgZW1pdGVyaWkjPC9pPiwgd2l0aCB0aGUgdG90YWwgb2YgPGk+I3RvdGFsIGRvY3VtZW50IzwvaT4uIDwvYnI+PC9icj4gVGhhbmsgeW91IQ==

Get product stocks for a specific product

request.description:
The method is used to find the stock information of a specific product.

The method returns:

*   warehouse information:
    *   name of the warehouse
    *   type of the warehouse - "en gros" or "en detail"
*   product information:
    *   product name
    *   product code (only if the company uses product codes)
    *   unit of measurement of the product
    *   product stock

If the warehouse is specified but not the product, all warehouse products will be returned.

If the product is specified but not the warehouse, all the warehouses in which the product appears together with the product information from each warehouse will be returned.

If neither the warehouse nor the product is specified, the information of all the warehouses and all their products will be returned.
